title: Problem with A10 update
content:
I just got a pretty small update (like 3.2MB). Once it finished updating I noticed a few problems:
Play store doesn't show anything for updates. Like nothing. Nothing pending, nothing recent. nothing. It also shows nothing installed.
Lost a bunch of Bluetooth connections. I got into my car and it immediately went through the pairing process (without me starting it). I completely lost my bluetooth connection to my home phone.
I'm sure there are others. I've tried rebooting and that didn't clear things up...
